ingredients.item: 400g pack Waitrose Lean Aberdeen Angus Beef Mince (Typically 5% Fat)

instructions.step: Fry the mince, onion and carrot in a large saucepan until the mince is browned, then add the tomatoes. Blend the stock cube with 150ml boiling water and add to the pan. Bring to
the boil, cover and simmer for 20 minutes, stirring from time to time.
Meanwhile, microwave the vegetable spaghetti according to the pack instructions and mix together.
Serve with the Bolognese, garnished with parsley.
